original_text: David was wearing a linen ephod. He danced with all his strength to worship the Lord.
korean_text: 다윗이 여호와 앞에서 힘을 다하여 춤을 추는데 그 때에 다윗이 베 에봇을 입었더라

sentences.original_text: David was wearing a linen ephod.
He danced with all his strength
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 모든 힘을 다해 춤을 췄습니다
